name: Ghostship
long_description:
We find bugs in your product with AI agents that crawl across your app and test its features. All you need to do is connect your Github and every time you create a PR, Ghostship will figure out where the bugs are before you push to main.

We're starting with web apps, but we'll eventually test any piece of software your users would interact with like a mobile app or a desktop app.

Ghostship â€” ship something people want.
one_liner: AI Agents that Find Bugs in Your Product
